data.actual_result: The guild changes while in image preview
data.short_description: While previewing an image, ctrl/cmd + (number 1-9) still allows you to change guilds and once changed can then send messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Obtain a message with an attached image - Click the image to bring it into preview mode - Press crtl-1,2,3 etc and notice that now the chatbox is selected and you can now send messges etc
